posts.post_title: WTB HOF Hindu or better backs.
posts.post_content:
Title says it all.  
I'm looking to add a few lower grade harder back HOFs.

Hindu is my main focus but would love to add some even scarcer backs as well.

Paying good prices.  PM or email at [url]jcosta19@gmail.com[/url].
